comments.comment: Meka publish karana gonbassata kiyanna kemathi. Hariyatama ithihaasaya dhenaganna. Mokada israel ekak hedhune kohomada. Palastine warun inna dheela aythi karaganna uthsaagha kala. Amerikawa israel.walata kade yana rata. Palastine walata wuna assadhaaranayata thamai arabi ratawal yuddha kale. Umba kiyana tharame ridhenna gehuwa kiyala dheyak nehe. Mokadha amerkawa kawadath karana ketawilla arabeen athare athi kala. Arabi ratawal eksath wena eka nethi kala. Eya thawamath thibenawa. Hebei pothe hetiyata eksath wenawa. Eeta passe israelayata dhuwanna thenak nethi wenawa. Mokada israel wata karala inne arabi ratawal. E kaale wenakota amerikawa wage balawath ratawal ballata gihin thiyewi. E thamai dhenata patang ganna yana loka yuddhaya. Amerikawa hema reddak assema gihin prashna edha edha anthimata thurkiyata atha thiyenawa. Thurkiyata atha thibba dawasa thamai amerikawa naaganne.
